TopicTitle: How do you name your ships/Missions?

Articles.Content:
I usually go with (like NASA does) something like "Orion", "Guardian" (For Weaponry Satellites) I also sometimes run out of ideas, So i sometimes name my satellites/ships Fayde. Also when i am starting missions, I'll Name them a name that has to do with the planet i'm landing on. For example, Mun is Munar 12 or Kerpollo 11 (My fav is kerpollo 11).

So how do you name your ships/missions?

Do you do something like, Don't crash Mk.I or The Munar Docktar Mk.I (Ha...Ha...LOL)
I'm not being funny, but come on man, there is literally this same thread on the same page.
Oh i didn't see that...Okay. Sorry bout that. My PC was bugging out anyways when i was trying to post...I'll have a mod close it lol.
